name: try to stay alive
description:
Info about the game:

Try to stay alive is a ultra hard survival game where you need to be aware that you don't run out of oxygen. As a main element you have oxygen were you can carry only so much of at one time. When you start a game you spawn with a large oxygen tank with just enough oxygen to setup a small base with a oxygen filter.

The story:

The story line behind the game is that you live in a world where there is a oxygen shortage in the air. And you just flee you one village that was attacked by a mutated army. Now you need to build op your live up again.

game play trailer:



Features:

  • Make houses
  • Fight enemy's
  • Manage you oxygen
  • Grater resources
  • And more tinges in the future when the game gets more developed

Features i am working on:

  • Enemy's
  • Random enemy bases
  • Proper building
  • Better animations
  • Better and more clearer menus
  • Procedurally generated world
  • Better weapon system
  • sound/music

Something's about me:

  • My name is Butros.
  • I live in the Netherlands.
  • I am making games for over 4 years now.
  • I am still in school so development is a little bid slow sometimes sorry for that.
